title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set on row[0]
description: When an invalid filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0' is set, the data set returns the wrong result or returns a null result set.
OB: Currently, when an invalid filter expression is set on row[0], the data set is not returning the expected result.
EB: The expected behavior is that a relevant error message should pop up when an invalid filter expression is set on row[0].
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set an invalid filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' on row[0] in the data set.
2. Observe the wrong data set result or null result set being returned.
